channel.title: Tribrid the new rsps era 317+ active players online everyday!
channel.description:
Features Grand Exchange Flawless party room Lottery Dicing Multiple world support Cross-world player list support Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently) Flawless duel arena, with staking Flawless shopping system Flawless banking system, with searching. Flawless farming system PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc Rank Icon changing system Flawless loyalty title system Flawless donator system Refined item definition system New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. Event schedule system New character file system (credits to Lin for the format) Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally) Perfect curse system Weapon combination selection in duel arena Advanced MySQL system
Play now at : www.tribrid.org
or download the client here [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20401721/webclient.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20401721/webclient.jar[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QcQc2Yq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GeExOhq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DBo4yOQ.png[/img]

item.title: Tribrid the new rsps era 317+ active players online everyday!
item.dc:creator: @amin45 amin45
item.description:
@amin45 wrote:

Features
Grand Exchange
Flawless party room
Lottery
Dicing
Multiple world support
Cross-world player list support
Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently)
Flawless duel arena, with staking
Flawless shopping system
Flawless banking system, with searching.
Flawless farming system
PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc
Rank Icon changing system
Flawless loyalty title system
Flawless donator system
Refined item definition system
New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc.
Event schedule system
New character file system (credits to Lin for the format)
Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally)
Perfect curse system
Weapon combination selection in duel arena
Advanced MySQL system

Play now at : www.tribrid.org

or download the client here https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20401721/webclient.jar
